sentences: Ta on viimase aasta jooksul olnud väga edukas.
Viimase kuu jooksul on toimunud palju muudatusi.
See on viimase sajandi üks suurimaid avastusi.
context: The word 'viimase' in Estonian is used to describe something that has happened recently or is the most recent in a series of events. It can be translated to English as 'latest', 'last', or 'recent', depending on the context.
